title: Guys I need a honest opinion about pes ece
content: Is it really that difficult or is it doable, I've heard alot about how hard it is, need a honest opinion

comments.body: You can check the FAQs: https://bit.ly/pesu-faq
ive heard maintaining a 7+cgpa is extremely difficult is this true?
honesty is a rare virtue. Biasness is more common

Yes it's a bit hard from what I know .
I have  friends who are from ECE , they always kept me telling how difficult it was for them ..
And coming to the main point (PLACEMENTS) Its really really very bad for them ... And almost half of the ECE PPL are looking for CSE jobs..
Don't da, didn't u see the posts before this, never ever take ece pes
